title: Digital - Tutors - Foundational Elements of Art for the Rest of
description:
Info:
1h 50m


Difficulty Level Beginner

Quiz & Test-Enabled
Project Files Included

What you will learn
In this training, you will learn key fundamentals that will strengthen your creative abilities as an artist, whether you're working traditionally or digitally.
We'll begin this process by learning about different types of lines and how we can use them as a tool to communicate visually. Next we'll focus on the elements of shape and form and how the relate to one another in both 2D and 3D. From there we'll study value and we can use value add volume and dimension to a form. Follow this we'll discover how we can draw objects in space by using one, two, and three point perspective. Along the way we will also learn about some key principles of composition and how we can use them to create visually appealing and eye catching pieces of art. Finally, we'll learn about the basic properties of color.
By the end of this training, you'll have a much stronger understanding of the foundational elements of art and how to start applying them to your own work.

Tutor
Kurt Jones

10 Lessons

1. Introduction and project overview 01:09
2. Understanding line 16:28
3. Basic elements of shape and form 10:08
4. Building value 14:09
5. Drawing in one-point perspective 15:43
6. Drawing in two-point perspective 11:23
7. Drawing in three-point perspective 09:45
8. Principles of composition: Part 1 10:07
9. Principles of composition: Part 2 11:11
10.The basics of color 10:34
